title: Please Fix
body: This is an update to my last post which was deleted. I now can log into my account, but the reconnect thing is still there. It wont let me reconnect to my last game which i'm sure was redone, but it still has the reconnect on it, and when i press it, nothing happens. Can someone tell me how to fix? If not then league just lost a s2 player.

replies.body: Not having full context here, but it sounds like your match ended but your network hasn't received that notice yet.  I recommend restarting it to push that through and return to the lobby, otherwise you might have to wait a bit.  Hopefully everything is fine now!
